title: Increase the {h1} of your teams {br}and ensure the {h2} of your data
card1.title: Advanced user management
card1.content: Easily manage your employees, external partners, and product security and access. The kSuite dashboard lets you control all aspects of your business from a single place.
card2.title: Team Management
card2.content: Create work teams with specific rights and access to facilitate the management of your employees. kSuite simplifies and accelerates all management of your staff movements.
card3.title: Shared calendars and address books
card3.content: Share the calendars and address books you want, even if you are linked to multiple organizations. Users on a team automatically access shared resources.
